title: Disclaimer
text: GHC token can only be exchanged by ETH. All the cryptocurrency exchanges are voluntary and are based on the consensus of the value shared by the GHC. ONE project.Please notice that the ETH and GHC tokens are digital tokens running on the Ethereum network, and their value is determined by consensus. Any form of exchange does not constitute any investment behavior. Since this project is a global project, if the region or country where you are located prohibits participation in blockchain/crypto currency events, please consciously comply with the local compliance requirements yourself.
